author: daxian-dbw
body:
Update all existing AST visitor types in PowerShell as necessary for them to work correctly with chain operator

This issue is a follow-up work item for the PR #9849, as stated in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9849#issuecomment-542394950
title: Update all existing AST visitor types in PowerShell as necessary for them to work correctly with chain operator
